message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"afternoon (the time after noon and before evening)","sentence":"下午天气好。","image_prompt":"A softly animated scene in a gentle apocalyptic style: A classroom clock shows the time as 2 p.m. Sunlight streams through the window, casting long shadows on the floor. Trees are visible outside, and the overall mood is peaceful despite subtle hints of an abandoned world (faded colors, quiet emptiness). The focus is on the afternoon brightness and tranquility.","sentence_translation":"The afternoon weather is good."}
